attributes.action: Stop Bonus and give Businesses back their overdrafts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Thousands of Businesses and their employees are paying the price for bonus by banks taking back the overdraft.

We need to force Banks to forget their bonus and give business a chance to survive.

Every Overdraft they take back there are stunting growth and survival - forcing business to make redundancies and even to cease trading costing us the tax payer even more money.

We as business owners who take running their operations very seriously. We  need to stop this practice and  give us back our overdrafts and even help us through these extraordinary times.

Pass this on to other Companies and let see if we can change the  ethos of it is not the Banks Problem.

 WE Need help now, so lets get them to re think this practice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
